NEWS

  • Intermed Gateways participated at the Global Shipping Conference (Singapore, 10-11 September 2015). Intermed Gateways repeated its participation at the annual Global Shipping Conference. After the success of its participation in the previous edition, Intermed Gateways was Co-sponsor of this important event of the shipping industry. Mrs Christine Cabau, Intermed President, gave a keynote speech during the session Mapping out the future of the container shipping
  • Position paper on Regulation proposal establishing a framework on market access to port services and financial transparency of ports. (October 2013).
  • “The role of Mediterranean ports in achieving a more sustainable and efficient European logistics and transport network” by Intermed President at the European Parliament on 12 November 2012.
